content: I've been thinking a lot about my online presence lately, and I realized that I was posting just to post, rather than sharing meaningful content. Before my break, I was posting at least 3 times a week, but I wasn't really thinking about what I was sharing or why. I just wanted to keep up with my followers and get likes. But now, I want to focus on sharing more personal and meaningful content, like you suggested. Do you have any tips on how to plan and schedule my posts in advance, so I can make sure I'm consistently posting quality content?
